TopicTitle: Full-screen mode oval-y and kind of blurry

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone, I have a problem. Whenever I play KSP in full screen, all the circles are oval-ish, letters are blurry, and so on. I don't know how to fix it, and my temporary solution has been just to play on a different screen resolution, but I would really like to be able to play in full screen. If it helps, I'm using a Mac and I'm playing version 1.0.4.

Edited October 23, 2015 by astrokerb

Have you verified that the screen resolution you're playing at (in your graphics settings) matches the native resolution of your monitor? Sounds like you've got the aspect ratio set differently from what your monitor's.
